title: Term Life Insurance
shortDetails: Affordable coverage for a specific period with guaranteed premiums.

title: Senior Life Plan
shortDetails: Tailored coverage for seniors with no medical exams required.

title: Whole Life Insurance
shortDetails: Lifelong protection with cash value accumulation benefits.

title: Child Life Insurance
shortDetails: Protect your child's future with lifelong coverage and savings.

title: Family Protection Plan
shortDetails: Comprehensive coverage for all family members under one plan.

title: Accidental Death Policy
shortDetails: Financial protection in case of accidental death or injury.

title: Critical Illness Cover
shortDetails: Lump sum payout on diagnosis of serious illnesses like cancer, stroke, etc.

title: Mortgage Protection Insurance
shortDetails: Keep your home secure by covering mortgage payments if you pass away.

title: Disability Income Insurance
shortDetails: Monthly income support if you become disabled and unable to work.

title: Group Life Insurance
shortDetails: Ideal for employers to cover all employees under one affordable plan.

title: Travel Life Insurance
shortDetails: Life insurance for frequent travelers, with global protection.

title: Return of Premium Plan
shortDetails: Get all your premiums back if you outlive the policy term.

title: Final Expense Insurance
shortDetails: Designed to cover funeral costs and final expenses.

title: Joint Life Insurance
shortDetails: Covers two lives under one policy, ideal for couples.

title: Universal Life Insurance
shortDetails: Flexible life insurance with savings and lifelong coverage.

title: Indexed Universal Life
shortDetails: Earn interest based on market index while keeping death benefits.

title: Cancer Care Insurance
shortDetails: Provides coverage for cancer diagnosis and treatment expenses.

title: Long-Term Care Insurance
shortDetails: Covers extended medical care like nursing homes or in-home care.

title: Income Protection Plan
shortDetails: Protects your income during times of illness or injury.

title: Military Family Insurance
shortDetails: Exclusive life coverage options for military personnel and their families.
